 Chaar Din Ki Chandni true to its title is a  
 Comedy with the essence of romance, set      
 against the backdrop of Rajasthan at a       
 four-day wedding. A complete family          
 entertainer revolves around a Rajput family  
 and a family from Punjab, who are caught in  
 a situation to create the comedy  of         
 errors. In words to say both are             
 SINGHS but who is the real KING.
